mapper.select: SELECT file_path,user_id,belong_id,file_id,file_name,file_size,file_type,upload_time,folder_belong_id FROM tb_file WHERE user_id =#{userId} AND delete_id=0 ORDER BY file_type
SELECT * FROM tb_file WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND hash=#{hash}
SELECT file_id FROM tb_file WHERE belong_id=#{belongId} and file_name=#{fileName}

SELECT f.user_id,f.file_id,file_name,file_size,file_type,upload_time,d.delete_time FROM tb_file as f,tb_delete as d WHERE f.delete_id=d.delete_id AND f.user_id =#{userId} AND f.delete_id!=0 ORDER BY file_type
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_file SET file_name=#{fileName} WHERE file_id=#{fileId}
update tb_file set delete_id=#{deleteId} where file_id=#{fileId}
update tb_file set belong_id=#{nBelongId} where file_id=#{fileId}
update tb_file t set t.belong_id=#{nBelongId} where t.file_id in (select * from (select file_id from tb_file where belong_id=#{cBelongId}) as a )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_file( user_id, du_you, file_name, file_type, file_path, file_size, hash, belong_id, upload_time, delete_id, folder_belong_id ) VALUES ( #{userId},#{duYou},#{fileName},#{fileType},#{filePath},#{fileSize},#{hash},#{belongId},#{uploadTime},#{deleteId},#{folderBelongId} )
